opening.message: Hey you 👀 What brings you on here tonight?

options.text: Looking to vibe and see where it goes 😏
Just bored, not expecting much tbh.
Honestly? Down to meet someone fun *and* respectful.
Lol depends, you sending pics or what?

msg2_1.message: I like that energy 😌 How do you feel about setting some boundaries early on?

options.text: Definitely. Gotta be clear about what’s cool and what’s not.
Sure, but let’s not kill the vibe, yeah?
Eh, we’ll figure it out as we go.
Why so serious? It's just chat.

msg2_2.message: Haha fair. But just so we’re clear, I like to keep things respectful. Cool with that?

options.text: Of course. Respect goes a long way.
Yeah, I guess. If that’s your thing.
I mean… sure, as long as it’s still fun.
Don’t worry, I won’t bite... unless you want me to 😉

msg2_3.message: Ooo I like someone who knows what they want. Can we talk about consent before things get flirty?

options.text: Absolutely. Consent makes everything hotter.
Sure thing. Just ask and I’ll be honest.
If it’s mutual, does it really need to be said?
If you say no, I’ll stop. That’s enough, right?

msg3_1_1.message: That’s the kind of mindset I like 🫶 What do you think about exchanging pics?

options.text: Only if you’re comfy too. I ask first, always.
If we both want to, I’m into it.
I'll send one if you send one first 😉
Don’t ask, just surprise me 😏

ghosted.message: You’ve been left on read 👻 Maybe try being more respectful next time?

declined.message: Hey – I don’t think we’re on the same page. Take care ✌️

online_finish.message: I’m vibing this convo 💬 Let’s keep chatting online a bit longer.

meet_up.message: You’re a good communicator 😊 I’d be down to meet – let’s keep it respectful and chill.

msg3_1_2.message: Ok fair enough 😅 Just wanna make sure we’re on the same page. What are you into?

options.text: Let’s chat first, then see what clicks.
You tell me yours first 😉
If I say everything, does that scare you? 😈
Skip the chat, let’s just meet.

msg3_1_3.message: Hmm. I get it, but miscommunication can ruin the vibe too 😬 Wanna keep talking?

options.text: Yeah, happy to clarify stuff if needed.
Only if it stays chill, no lectures.
Sure. But only if you’re into what I’m into 😉
Nah I’m good. Later.

msg3_2_1.message: Love to hear that ❤️ Wanna keep it text for now or maybe meet up?

options.text: Let’s keep chatting first.
I’d be into meeting up if you are.
Let’s swap pics and decide 😉
Only if you host.

msg3_2_2.message: Mmm okay 😐 Respect is kinda a must for me. What would a fun convo look like to you?

options.text: Playful, cheeky but not pushy.
We just vibe and flirt hard.
You lead, I’ll follow.
Ugh you ask a lot of questions.

msg3_2_3.message: Fair enough 😌 You down for honest convo about what we want?

options.text: Absolutely, honesty is sexy.
Yeah, just don’t make it awkward 😅
Let’s skip to the good stuff.
You thinking what I’m thinking? 😏

msg3_2_4.message: Haha cute, but let’s stay respectful here 😅

options.text: You’re right. My bad!
Didn’t mean it like that 😅
Come on, don’t be so uptight.
Okay okay 😇 Let’s keep it PG… for now.

msg3_3_1.message: Oof. That answer got me smiling 😊 Wanna keep talking or take it off the app?

options.text: Let’s move to another app.
Still feeling this convo here.
I’ll give you my number if you’re serious.
Only if you send a pic first 😉

msg3_3_2.message: That’s a solid start. Consent is 🔑. Want to chat fantasies?

options.text: Only if you’re comfy too.
I’m open if you are.
Sure, but I’m not into anything too freaky.
Let’s just surprise each other 😏

msg3_3_3.message: Hmm… that’s how things get messy. I like it clear.

options.text: You’re right. Better safe than sorry.
I get it. Want to start over?
Fine, we can talk about it.
You’re making this weird.

msg4_generic.message: This has been fun 😊 Wanna keep chatting or take it further?

options.text: I’d like to meet in person if you’re down.
Let’s stick to chatting for now.
Let’s swap some pics first and see 😉
Only if we skip the small talk.
